text: Escondido ( ) is a city located in San Diego County's North County region, northeast of Downtown San Diego, California. Created in 1888, it is one of the oldest cities in San Diego County. The city had a population of 151,038 in 2020. ==References== Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in San Diego County, California Category:1888 establishments in the United States Category:1880s establishments in California
title: Escondido, California
